title: Ep. 599 - Biden's Coronavirus Adviser Says People Should Die At 75
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, Joe Biden’s coronavirus adviser is on the record saying that everyone is better off dying at the age of 75. This seems like a rather serious conflict of interest. Also Five Headlines including brave feminists remaining silent as prosecutors drop sexual assault charges against Jacob Blake as part of a plea deal, and the mayor of DC is the latest Democrat mayor to break her own quarantine rules. Apparently she gets to be an exception, she explained. And in our Daily Cancellation, I must cancel many states across our union for the sins they have committed. This has nothing to do with the election. It’s much more serious than that. All of that on the way, and more.
If you like The Matt Walsh Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: WALSH and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/walsh
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
